comment: Anyone who has missed out on a Xmas dinner for what ever reason ( illness , financial , etc ) . We would be willing to provide a xmas meat hamper ( vegetarian option available ) so you could enjoy a belated one with your families , we will also provide the vegetables . Please dm x
